nodes.text: Starlight Two was the callsign assigned to the second pilot of the Rebel Alliance's Starlight Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, L'ulo L'ampar used this callsign on returning from Operation Starlight, after he flew an RZ-1 A-wing interceptor against Imperial forces.

Starlight Two appeared in Star Wars 11, a comic written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Jan Bazaldua, and published by Marvel Comics on February 3, 2021. In the issue, it is used by L'ulo L'ampar, however he used a different callsign, Starlight Three, in Star Wars 10, published on January 6, 2021.
